list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: clean or brighten the surface of (something) by rubbing it hard, typically with an abrasive or detergent.
subject (a place, text, etc.) to a thorough search in order to locate something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: David scoured each newspaper for an article on the murder
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: David quét từng tờ báo cho một bài báo về vụ giết người

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the action of scouring or the state of being scoured, especially by swift-flowing water.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the scour of the tide may cause lateral erosion
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: SCOUR của thủy triều có thể gây xói mòn bên

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: diarrhea in livestock, especially cattle and pigs.
